text: satyavisvasiyaya oral parannu -ayal pharaveanre vansattilpetta visvasam olippiccuvecca oralayirunnu: "enre nathan allahuvan ennu parannatinre peril ninnal oru manusyane keallukayea? addeham ninnalute nathanil ninnulla vyaktamaya telivukal keantuvannittum! addeham kallam parayunnavananenkil a kalavinre deasaphalam addehattinu tanneyan. maricc satyavananenkilea, addeham ninnale takkitu ceyyunna siksakalil cilatenkilum ninnale badhikkum. tirccayayum paridhi vitunnavareyum kallam parayunnavareyum allahu nervaliyilakkukayilla
